Title: AWESOME SOUND, QUALITY AND LOOK.
Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2024
Body: I'm 57 so imagine how many ive had over the years starting with the sony walkman so when i say these are really a top 3 pair im telling the truth. I travel a lot for work. I use these all day and they are amazing for the price. Wherever I am I have them in and they are super comfortable and the sound for music comparison to 129 dollar pairs and the look is awesome plus they stay in your ears when you work out. The battery is solid and they last a long time! Amazing!  Another good feature is you can keep one in your ear and one in the charger and it works great.

Title: Exceptional Value and Comfort in Affordable Wireless Earbuds
Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
Body: I recently stumbled upon a hidden gem on Amazon in the form of wireless earbuds that exceeded all expectations. Priced affordably, these earbuds not only offer an exceptional value for money but also deliver an impressive performance that rivals more expensive alternatives.One of the standout features of these wireless earbuds is their comfort. The design is not only sleek and stylish but also ergonomic, ensuring a snug fit in my ears. The inclusion of multiple ear tip sizes caters to a wide range of ear sizes, providing a customized and comfortable experience for users. Whether you have smaller or larger ears, these earbuds are likely to fit well and stay securely in place.The sound quality is surprisingly robust for earbuds in this price range. The bass is punchy, and the highs and mids are clear, providing an enjoyable listening experience across various music genres. The Bluetooth connectivity is seamless, and I experienced minimal dropouts during use, contributing to an uninterrupted and immersive audio experience.Battery life is commendable, offering extended usage between charges. The compact charging case not only keeps the earbuds protected but also ensures they are always ready for use when needed. This feature is especially convenient for on-the-go individuals who require a reliable audio companion throughout the day.Navigating playback controls is straightforward, thanks to the touch-sensitive surfaces on each earbud. Controlling music playback, answering calls, and activating voice assistants can be done with ease, eliminating the need to fumble with your device.Overall, these wireless earbuds are a great find on Amazon for those seeking an affordable yet high-quality audio solution. Whether you're a music enthusiast or someone who just wants a reliable pair of earbuds for everyday use, these offer a fantastic combination of comfort, functionality, and affordability. I wholeheartedly recommend these earbuds to anyone in search of a budget-friendly audio companion that doesn't compromise on performance.

Title: Great product
Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2024
Body: Very pleased with the quality of the sound.  Have been using this for over a week and have not had to charge the case yet.  Ear buds work for hours without being recharged.  Great value.  Comfortable to wear with the 3 different size rubber ear pieces to make them really fit well.  Controls are easy to use.  Instructions are straight forward and complete.  Recommended highly.

Title: High Reliability, Stylish, Exceptional Value: Affordable Wireless Earbuds
Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
Body: The wireless earbuds in black are not only a visual delight with their stunning design, but they also offer an impressive sound quality that will satisfy even the most discerning audiophiles.One standout feature is their unquestionable reliability. These earbuds establish a fast and seamless Bluetooth connection, allowing you to enjoy uninterrupted music, no matter where you go. The easy setup process ensures a hassle-free experience, making them an ideal choice for everyday use.Having used these earbuds for a couple of weeks, I am pleased to report their exceptional performance. Despite their affordable price range, their reliability is truly unmatched. They are a solid alternative to much more expensive, name-branded earbuds, providing excellent value for money.Additionally, I purchased a silicone protective “smaate” case not only keeps the earbuds safe but also still conveniently displays the battery percentage on its front.  LINK HERE: smaate Earbuds Case Compatible Silicon Protective Cover with “S” Shaped Dual Carabiner, with Window for LED Display (Black) https://a.co/d/8hMmUVsThis display feature ensures you always have a clear idea of the charge level, leaving you worry-free about running out of power during your music sessions. The user-friendly controls add to the overall appeal of these earbuds. Adjusting the volume or powering them on and off is effortless, simplifying your audio experience.To put it simply, these wireless earbuds are a remarkable investment given their affordability. Even when compared to earbuds five times their price, they still provide a solid option for everyday use. If you're looking for a reliable and value-packed audio companion without breaking the bank, these affordable wireless earbuds are the perfect choice.

Title: Good for the price!
Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2024
Body: I’ve used these daily at work, and they easily last with moderate use during my 10 hour shift.  The sound quality is decent and they are comfortable to wear.  A bonus for me is that they stay put where other brands have not.  Decent quality and price with quick delivery.  I would definitely buy these again.

Title: Phenomenal earbuds!
Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2024
Body: Absolutely amazing earbuds for a reasonable price! They hold a charge outside of the case for the majority of my day, charge rather quick, sound great and fit comfortably!

Title: Survived going through a wash and dry cycle
Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2024
Body: Sounds great easy to use and seems to fit decently in the ear compared to other ear buds.  I accidentally washed my ear buds and put it in the dryer before realizing. When I went to get my stuff out of the dryer I noticed my ear buds in pieces. I put back together let it dry out for a few extra days then put back in the charging case and surprisingly the ear bud still works like it did on day one. So I would have to say this brand is pretty durable.

Title: Quality budget alternative for AirPods
Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2024
Body: I was recommended these by a friend who has an Android and has been using these for a few years, I got the white ones and the case is really stylish and lights up to show the charge level. They hold a charge for a long time and work great! I use them in a noisy work environment to listen to music and podcasts, and I can hear everything great. They’re pretty comfortable and work seamlessly with my iPhone. My husband also has an iPhone and 2 pairs of AirPods and was skeptical at first but then was jealous of the cool way my ear bud case lights up. Definitely a great budget alternative!!!

Title: Stays put, great sound & battery life!
Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
Body: It has been difficult for me to find a decent pair of earbuds that doesn't have the over the ear hook, that'll stay in place after wearing for more than hour... Until now!I don't like the over the ear hooks because I wear glasses and the ear piece of my glasses puts pressure on the ear hook and after about an hour, the area behind my ear starts to hurt really bad. I've tried several different kinds of ear buds that are supposed to fit snuggly in the ear and not fall out, but after about 30 min, guess what... They start working their way out! One night, I was at work, wearing one of my earbuds and washing dishes. Before I knew it, the earbud slipped out and fell into the dish water. Thank God they were the water proof kind.A few weeks ago, I saw the T12's and thought, what the hell... They were on sale, so I figured I'd give them a shot. There were a few factors involved with making the decision to get these.1. They were on sale. (Who doesn't like to save money?)2. The battery life they claimed to have. I was skeptical about that. 12 to 14 hours, continuous play? The ones I was wearing have a 4 hour battery life, but had magnetic batteries that I could just change out without having to remove the earbud. The first night at work, I fired up my music at around 5p.m. and listened to it for my entire 9 hour shift and on the drive home. I was immediately impressed!3. Stayed put the entire time! After a little while, I could hardly tell that it was there. While I'm working, I only use the left earbud cause I have a headset on my right ear. No more worries about the earbud working loose and falling into the dish water again! One thing I did change was the earbud tip. I replaced the soft silicone tip with a memory foam cushion tip. They aren't cheap, but they are well worth the money.4. Sounds quality is great! No static in the background and the sound is nice and clear. I can actually hear the lyrics!I told myself that I'd give them 2 weeks of use before deciding that they really were all that, or if I was going to have to go back to my search for the perfect earbuds... Again, if in fact, they even existed! Well, the 2 week  trial period is over, and here I am, doing something that I never do! Writing a review for them!Seriously folks, I highly recommend these earbuds. If I could give them more than 5 stars, I would in a heart beat!One thing I am going to do is order another pair of them, as soon as I'm done with this review, to have as back-ups!

Title: Better than Apple...I know, hard to believe
Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
Body: I've had Apple air pods pros. Lost them, damaged them. Had 3 pairs total. And they are pretty pricey as you well know and being easy to drop and lose, I started to think are they worth it for the price.I ran into these on Amazon and did my little research. But it never matters until you actually try them yourself. Everything sounded good but now it was time to see if I wasn't going to be let down as they are only $21 and you know the old saying "you get what you pay for ".These IMO beat Apple air pods! What I feared proved to be wrong. The sound quality and bass is very good. The functionality and ease of calling, answer phone calls and playing music is of ease. And one of the top reasons for me personally for getting these is the use of Siri.They exceeded my expectations by far! And the fact that it is over 80% cheaper than Apple air pods is insane! I seriously can't believe the quality.This has to be one of my better purchases on Amazon period!  It's a steal!I've told a few people that these are better than Apple air pods, in my opinion of course. And being that I've had a few Apple airpods, I'm more than qualified to have this opinion.This is one of those products that will be very hard to believe for many. But I truly love that fact that when I'm speaking to someone else on the other line, they can hear me clearly. With my Apple air pods, unfortunately after a while that was always an issue. I know many people can vouch for thatAnd what do you have to lose? They're only about 23 dollars.

Title: Perfect for my needs
Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2024
Body: Bought to replace Bluetooth headphones.  Fits nicely, sounds as good as the headphones they are replacing.  Not used for music (for the most part), but for work meetings and such, sound great and look much better than headphones during meetings.

Title: Love these!
Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2024
Body: I real love these. Charge last a long time.They sound good. I am going to buy another pair while they are available so I have a extra pair. Can't beat the  price. Everyone can hear me when talking on the phone.

Title: Some of the best money I’ve spent.
Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2024
Body: I’ve had several pairs of AirPods, and have lost them all. I figured that I would give these a try and save some money. These turned out to be a great deal. Long lasting batter. Great sound. Great call quality. The only thing I don’t like are the voice prompts that play when you receive a call or reach volume min/max. For $20 I can live with it

Title: It works perfectly
Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2024
Body: I like the sound of it when I put them on and go for a walk or also at home when I talk to my frineds I keep them on and do my chores around the house. I immediately connects to my phone right when I put them on and they turn off when I take them off and put them back in their box.

Title: Best gift if you asked me
Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
Body: It's been about 2 months I have these and I like how they fit after I change the ear piece size. I also bought another one for my uncle who works in IT and he love them makes working listening to music great and talking on the phone. The audio quality is great to just block out ppl chatting away and the function on the sensors are nice don't need to take my phone out to skip, pause, or even change the volume. Long lasting battery indeed they are no complaints here.

Title: Amazing charge!
Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
Body: So far these buds hold an amazing charge and work really well with my devices. I do wish the charging case had a flat bottom so it would stand but that is not a huge deal.

Title: Not bad, Not Bad At ALL!
Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
Body: Super surprised by these.Figured for the price they would be at best less “tin-treble” sounding than say, something from a discount store.But, No.The sound quality and Especially the Bass are magnificent!I have fat fingers so, if I Had to say one “con” for me would be that I have trouble sometimes getting them out of the charging case,….But Hey, that just means the magnets holding them in are super strong and you definitely wouldn’t lose one from falling out of the case accidentally.

Title: Great for travel
Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
Body: I got these to see if I like this style of earbuds before I spend the money on airpods. I have used these for 2 months now and love them. They fit great, keep a good charge, and have a good sound quality. I travel quite a bit so I think these will be great for travel. If I were to accidentally lose one, I could easily repurchase without spending a ton on money.

Title: Perfect for my use
Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
Body: I needed a pair of really Slim and lightweight earbuds as I have narrow ear canals and many of the earbuds don't sit properly. These fit perfectly and are very lightweight and stay in. The sound is excellent in stereo and the voice quality is very good according to the people I have used them with. For music they're okay just don't put it too loud then the music sound distorts. I used it for speaking on the phone hands-free and it is ideal. Works with my tablet as well.

Title: Awesome
Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Body: I’ve had 5-6 different ear bud brands. For the price, these have been best purchase Ever. Sound is good, pairing and controls super easy. The Battery life is Incredible! Go ALL day on a single charge, playing music and calls. Only complaint I have is they are a little annoying to get out of the case. They fit in super tight and no spot to grab a hold. Other than that. Awesome

Title: Battery Lasts Forever and Great Sound
Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2024
Body: I purchased these wireless earbuds bluetooth headphones on February 8th.  They arrived on the February 9th.I have used these wireless earbuds almost every day and I still have 50% of the battery life to go!  I have used them for calls, on planes with movies and tv shows, listening to podcasts and programs while I am running and they are still going strong.I had purchased a similar pair months ago and they have stayed on my desk as these new wireless earbuds just keep running!I did not think that any set of earbuds could continue to be used without charging them.  I decided to write this review now as I honestly do not know when they will run out of battery!

Title: Incredible
Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2024
Body: I love these earbuds so much, I bought a second set just to be on standby should I misplace these (which I’m prone to do).  First, they fit so well. Second, the sound is really incredible. I listened to Miles Davis “A Kind of Blue” recently and heard sounds I’ve never heard before. I’ve listened to the masterpiece dozens of times and it never sounded so good. Lastly, the value. I feel almost bad for how little they cost. These blow away my old Air Pods at 1/10th the cost. wholeheartedly recommend these earbuds. You will not be disappointed.

Title: Great earbuds at a bargain price
Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2024
Body: I have bought two pairs of these. I am constantly losing my earbuds between my mask and my glasses and my winter clothes. I didn’t want to spend a lot and after reading the reviews I bought these. They have great sound and I haven’t lost any yet although occasionally one falls out when I’m trying to put on my mask. I recommended them to a friend who was going on a trip and didn’t want to take her expensive apple earbuds. She told me they were fantastic. Now I have great sound and don’t worry if I lose one. They are so inexpensive. I can purchase another pair.

Title: Crazy long battery life great sound
Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2024
Body: I mainly use these to watch movies so I don't have the boom of my surround system annoying my wife upstairs lol. Sound quality is great IMO. Deep base and clear sound and I've been through 4-5 pairs of other earbuds to finally find these. I've never run the earbud battery charge out after hours of use and I've only charged the case ONCE in a month or so.  I read on other sites that people say these are as good as Airpods. No idea but they are certainly great especially for the price

Title: Ultimate Convenience and Performance in Compact Earbuds
Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2024
Body: I've recently discovered the perfect companion for both my active lifestyle and leisure time. these earbuds with a long-lasting battery life, small compact design, and noise reduction feature.These earbuds have truly revolutionized my audio experience. Whether I'm hitting the gym for an intense workout session or simply relaxing at home, they deliver exceptional sound quality while effectively blocking out unwanted noise, allowing me to focus entirely on my music or podcasts.What truly sets these earbuds apart is their long-lasting battery life. I never have to worry about them running out of power, even during extended use throughout the day.Their compact design makes them incredibly convenient to carry around, fitting snugly in my pocket or gym bag without adding any bulk.Overall, I can't recommend these earbuds enough. They've become an essential part of my daily routine, providing me with unparalleled audio performance and convenience wherever I go.

Title: Great sound with good Bluetooth range
Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
Body: I've had these ear buds for a couple of months now and can say that I'm pleased with their performance. I wanted an Air Pod style ear bud but didn't want to pay Air Pod prices. I can't compare these to the aforementioned product, but for my needs these fit the bill.Pairing was simple and automatic (I have an Android phone for reference, Samsung Note 10 to be exact). They connect every time to my phone with no issues.The sound is entirely adequate with the treble and bass both coming through clearly and cleanly. I use these at work (CNC machines) and while working outside around my house cutting grass and using various like tools. I never have a problem hearing my music or the spoken word.Bluetooth connectivity and range is good as well. I walked into a different room with multiple obstacles between the ear buds and my phone and the sound never cut out. Distance apart was about 40 feet. I'm sure I could have gone further. I haven't done a formal test of this as of yet. Usually my phone is clipped to my belt or laying just a few feet away so it doesn't cross my mind to be honest.They fit comfortably in my ears and the included charger keeps them ready to go. I can listen to them for at least two 10 hour days before I plug the charger in, but could go longer if I had to.Overall these are good ear buds for not a lot of money. I read the reviews on these before I purchased them to help me make a decision and I hope my review helps someone else make up their mind.

Title: Great earbuds for the price!!
Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Body: I love these and especially for the price!!! I have spent so much money on more expensive brands and they failed to work properly over and over.  But these are amazing!!! My only drawback to 6 stars is if they are paired to my iPad and I want to jump on the bath to listen to music on my phone, I can’t pair them to my phone until I unpair them from my iPad.  Otherwise the sound is comparable to $100+ earbuds and they fit well!!!

Title: Best Wireless Earbuds!
Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2024
Body: I’ve always went through many pairs of AirPods which are well over 100$. My last pair got ruined in the washer so I decided to try a cheaper route. These earbuds blew my expectations away, same type of feel as airpods, quality of sound is great, affordable, and durable. I accidentally washed them in the washer and they still work great. The charge has lasted a few weeks without charging them also.I’ll definitely be buying again!

Title: I was very surprised and pleased with the sound quality.
Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
Body: I bought it as a birthday gift for my nephew and he loved it so much I bought one for myself. It fits in my ear and doesn't keep falling out like my previous air bud. It's convenient to carry around in my purse.

Title: Pleasantly surprised!!!!
Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2024
Body: I needed some earbuds for listening to my show while feeding my baby - I didn't want to spend a lot of money because I knew I wouldn't use them a lot. But I am so surprised. Those earbuds are comfortable in my ear, they are really well made, they show you how much battery you have and I haven't charged them yet and they're still working after several weeks. I use them about 2 h every night. 100% recommend.
